name: Tiny Worlds in Flasks
description:
Made for LDJAM 38, Theme - A small world

Not really a game, but it's a cute toy. You may have fun playing.

At least I had fun making it, that's what counts.

Make a small world in a flask.

Controls with the mouse.

Screenshots save in data folder (with the windows version)

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/38/tiny-worlds...
